product_name: North Water Sea Tec Paddle Float
long_description: Ready to use at a moment's notice, The North Water Sea Tec Paddle Float is designed to conform to the deck of your touring kayak to maintain a low profile. Sea Tec Paddle Float offers the ability to secure the paddle at either end of the paddle float. High visibility reflective tape identifies the pockets where the paddle blade is inserted. Anchoring straps on either end of the paddle float allow it to be secured to the kayak. Can also be used as a pad for kneeling or sitting on shore.
short_description: Ready to use at a moment's notice, The North Water Sea Tec Paddle Float is designed to conform to the deck of your touring kayak to maintain a low profile.
